name: Singing Circles - Hardest music memory game ever
name_original: Singing Circles - Hardest music memory game ever
description:
Improve your memory with Singing Circles, the hardest music game for iPhone!
Repeat the sequence of sounds and colors with the pads, but here's the trick: you have to reproduce the melody AND play to the music. Good rhythm gives you extra points!

Singing Circles offers different levels of increasing difficulty that will let you play with awesome original music, inspired by the Top Hits we all know. 10, 20, 50, 100 notes..reach the top and be the one and only memory master!

How many pads can you remember in a row? Let's see what you got!

GAME RULES
Carefully listen to the music and repeat the sequence using the color pads. Rhythm is the key: the better your timing, the higher your score.
Get all the points and earn stars to unlock new levels and discover new songs!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
Reach the highest scores and challenge your friends! Do you have the best memory and rhythm skills?!

GAME FEATURES
- play awesome songs inspired by the best hits
- 10 levels of increasing difficulty, and more to come
- color pads with ultra-fast touch response

SUPPORT
Any question? Suggestion? Issue? email us at support@singingcirclesapp.com.
